summary: This is an email exchange between two U.S. Attorney's Offices (SDNY and an unspecified office) regarding a follow-up on identifying the appropriate contact for a grand jury request related to Epstein. The email shows coordination between federal prosecutors on the case.
keyFacts: Email exchange between U.S. Attorney's Offices regarding Epstein case coordination.
Discussion about identifying appropriate contact for a grand jury request.
Mentions potential contacts at either 'MD Fl' (likely Middle District of Florida) or 'ND Ga' (Northern District of Georgia).
Shows ongoing inter-district coordination among federal prosecutors in April 2019.
